lines: Hi Lava Minkateko Kwala Ndlwini Ya Wena, Ri Sasekile Siku Ri Komba Leswi Taka, Ri Sasekile Siku Ri Komba Leswi Taka.
2. Hi Kombela Tintswalo Ka Wena Muponisi, Hi Twele Vusiwana U Hi Hlantswa Swidyoho,
Hi Wisa Swirilwen Hi Siku Leri Ro Wisa, Hi Wisa Swirilwen Hi Siku Leri Ro Wisa.
3. Hi Dzuna Vito Rakwe Vana Kusuhi Hosi, Tisa Ku Vonakala Loko Hi Ta Ka Wena,
Hi Twise Hi Masiku Swa Ntsako Lowu Taka, Hi Twise Hi Masiku Swa Ntsako Lowu Taka.
4. Rito A Ri Twakale Eka Vanhu Hinkwavo, Hi Twele Vusiwana U Hlamula Swirilo, Siku Lera Savata A Ri Tshame Ka Hina,
Ku Kondza Hi Tlhandluka Ku Ta Fuma Na Wena.
